extendedInfo.description: Chuck E.âs Say Cheese! is a new free app that makes trips to Chuck E. Cheeseâs even more fun for kids of all ages. This app uses augmented reality to allow you to take fun, one-of-a-kind photos with Chuck E. on your next visit to Chuck E. Cheeseâs. In-store hotspots that activate the appâs augmented reality camera are located throughout every Chuck E. Cheeseâs location â on the sides of games, tabletops, everywhere! There are three different versions, and Chuck E. strikes a unique pose at each one. Make sure you find them all!Memories are meant to be shared, and snapshots can be shared easily with friends or family through Facebook, Twitter or email. You can even share your snapshot with chuckecheese.com for a chance to have it posted on Chuck E. Cheeseâs website, Twitter or Facebook page.Download the app, and start making memories that will last forever on your next visit to Chuck E. Cheeseâs!

reviews.title: This is fun!
reviews.comment: Coming from an ex employee, I\'d say it\'s pretty good for how new it is. Great job, I hope to see Chuck do more random things in the future!
reviews.author: Kyle Porche

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: I think this is a great app. I can see how people can\'t get it to work. Every time I took a pitcure I had to wait 20-30 seconds for Chucky to appear. Other than that got alot of great pics!
reviews.author: Valerie Rodda

reviews.title: Won\'t even start to load
reviews.comment: We are at chuck e cheeses now. And my baby wants to take pics. Its been \"loading\" for over 30 mins. And its still at 0%. I have a lg optimus. If this isn\'t going to work. Then take the pics off the wall. So kids will stop crying. I\'ve read so many other reviews that\'s say this same thing. Its not working.
reviews.author: Misty K.

reviews.title: The app won\'t download
reviews.comment: My baby wanted to go to Chuck E Cheese\'s just to take a picture with Chucky after seeing the commercial. I spent two hours waiting for it to download and it never did. Needless to say she  was very disappointed.
reviews.author: Tericka Washington

reviews.title: Pretty neat!
reviews.comment: App works pretty well. Only complaint is that the screen turns off after a few second if you don\'t snap a picture right away.
reviews.author: Kevin Cornell

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: I\'m not going to say it was completely bad. It worked for some people. Did not work for me and I have an LG Optimus Elite. My kids were disappointed they couldn\'t take a pic with virtual chuck e.g. But the original chuck e worked just as well... Uninstalling
reviews.author: Kareemah Johnson

reviews.title: Cool App
reviews.comment: Take pictures with the digital Chuck E. Cheese virtually anywhere inside the restaurant.  Adds to the already great Chuck E. Cheese experience.
reviews.author: Kevin Hall

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its so cool!!!! I love using it and it cool looking around the place for those spots and take a pic
reviews.author: yolany Maldonado

reviews.title: Annoying....
reviews.comment: This app is super irritating.  I spent like ten minuets just waiting for Chucky to pop up just so I could get a picture of him with my baby cousin\'s. Then when he finally showed up he was facing the wrong way and if I moved my phone even a little chucky would disappear. So in the end its an annoying app.
reviews.author: Sabrina Jordan

reviews.title: Cool app for kids
reviews.comment: Really cool how Chuck E. appears out of nowhere. My daughter thought it it was the neatest thing ever.
reviews.author: Riley Hyde

reviews.title: Tooooo loooonnnggggg....
reviews.comment: At 30 min. And only at 9% downloaded.  As much as this company makes they should install WiFi.   This sux.
reviews.author: Roberto Morales

reviews.title: Easy and fun
reviews.comment: For signs on the table you need to be in front of the sign to see the front of Chucky.    Chucky appears by himself if the sign is blue. If the sign is pink Chucky appears out of some weird looking TV static. I didn\'t like that.  Download the app at home on your wifi. The signal inside of Chuck E Cheese is very slow.  Cool idea and great app. Using a Nexus 4.
reviews.author: Amy Dahl

reviews.title: Worked for me.
reviews.comment: Using Galaxy s3. App file size is kinda big, so it takes a while to download.  Took a minute to figure out. Just focused the camera completely on a \"hotspot\" for a couple seconds till Chuck e appeared, then slowly backed out to get my daughter in the pic.    The animation of the mouse made it a little challenging to take a good pic, but I did get a couple decent ones from throughout the restaurant.  4 stars because the app wouldn\'t close on its own. Had to kill it every time.
reviews.author: jason timbreza

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: It works but took forever for chuckle room pop out. My kids was upset and i couldn\'t get many pictures of them. I will try it again if it the same deleting the app.
reviews.author: Stacey Seiler

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: 6 hours later and it was only HALF installed. Kids were very upset. After seeing commercial, to tell them no, upsetting.
reviews.author: Denise Ziegler

reviews.title: Works well when combined w/patience
reviews.comment: Well its cool. Kids liked it. It did take awhile to DL but going outside sped up the process. You do have to hover a bit for it to catch and make him appear. But when the angle was right pics came out fun! They have different stations throughout with different images on some. We had fun with it. Just be patient till it catches. Remember .  Its for kids.. their size. Not ours. Croutch down a bit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t always work
reviews.comment: It takes a while to get Chuck to show up & sometimes he doesn\'t show & you have to start over. Also it won\'t let you exit, I\'d have to hit home button to get out of the app.
reviews.author: Laura W Santos

reviews.title: My son alwayd has fun
reviews.comment: He loves it
reviews.author: Alvin Paez

reviews.title: Wack
reviews.comment: I have the lg Optimus l9 chuck e showed up for 1 2nd and poof gone never to return and the app is slow
reviews.author: Latifah Anderson

reviews.title: AMAZING APPLICATION!!!!!!!!!
reviews.comment: This aplication is hard to use at first, but after you figer it out it is a realy good!  I\'m also impressed with the graphics!!!
reviews.author: Patrick Hirsch
